name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! Fukkatsu no Beldia
summary: An action platformer based-off the Konosuba franchise that was included as a bonus item in the special edition of the first Blu-ray volume of Konosuba 2.

alternative_names.name: KONOSUBA -God's blessing on this wonderful world! The Resurrection of Beldia
